thread.title: 15 Reasons Panda Express Would Be Perfect Lover (If It Were A Living Person)
thread.title_full: 15 Reasons Panda Express Would Be The Perfect Lover (If It Were A Living Person)

author: Christopher Hudspeth
title: 15 Reasons Panda Express Would Be Perfect Lover (If It Were A Living Person)
text:
View this image ›
@officialpandaexpress / Getty / Via instagram.com Canada, Puerto Rico, Mexico, Guam — Panda has already found its way to a bunch of places, so it’d obviously be a wanderlusty-as-heck human. You’d be able to take photos in all of those cheesy traveling couple poses!
ID: 10176562 2. Panda looks good regardless of lighting and filters. View this image ›
Panda Express / Wikipedia Styrofoam, plastic fork, orange chicken piled on, that’s when you look delicious-est, I hope that you don’t take it wrong.
ID: 10182475 3. Panda is currently at the perfect age. View this image ›
Google / Wikipedia Panda is 33 years old which means it’s literally peaking right now. What better time to get romantically involved with the happiest version of Panda there’ll ever be?
ID: 10176430 4. Panda has no shady secrets regarding its whereabouts. View this image ›
Panda Express For all of the insecure, suspicious daters out there who don’t trust their significant others — imagine if they were willing to tell you their precise location at any given time? Panda Express literally does that by telling you where ALL OF THE PANDAS are .
ID: 10182755 5. Panda is always down to try new things. View this image ›
Panda Express They once created an orange chicken burrito . So open-minded.
ID: 10182399 6. Panda always knows exactly what to say, and delivers words so eloquently, whether it’s a wonderful life perspective… View this image ›
@PandaExpress / Via Twitter: @PandaExpress It’d be like dating a brilliant poet.
ID: 10176460 7. Or a simple reminder to be a better person… View this image ›
@PandaExpress / Via Twitter: @PandaExpress You’re right, babe, thanks for reminding me…
ID: 10176497 8. Or a flirty little message… View this image ›
@PandaExpress / Via Twitter: @PandaExpress Is that code, Panda?
ID: 10176515 9. Panda always takes good care of itself and keeps everything fresh. View this image ›
officialpandaexpress / Via instagram.com Feast your eyes on those sexy ingredients, sliced, trimmed, and peeled daily for your satisfaction.
ID: 10176678 10. Panda is considerate and conscious of your insecurities. View this image ›
@kxssidylynn / Via Twitter: @kxssidylynn A lot of people don’t know how to use chopsticks and get embarrassed about it, but Panda introduced a combo utensil called the “chork.” Wow, so thoughtful.
ID: 10181940 11. Panda is always available by phone. View this image ›
@PandaExpress / Via instagram.com You’ll never have to worry about waiting long to hear back via text, because anytime you contact Panda, they’ll immediately get ready for you.
ID: 10182747 12. Panda would throw a heck of a party. View this image ›
@PandaExpress / Via Twitter: @PandaExpress They’ve got a catering service which means they can handle the responsibility of satisfying large groups of people.
ID: 10182553 13. Panda would listen and pay attention to you. View this image ›
@officialpandaexpress / Via instagram.com You know how hard it is to find someone who cares what you like these days? That’s a hot commodity, but the Panda app remembers your past orders. It knows what you like ;)
ID: 10183464 14. You’d impress your family when you bring Panda home. View this image ›
@officialpandaexpress / Via instagram.com When someone introduces the person they’re dating to their parents and siblings, they want them to be impressed. Well, best believe if you show up with Panda in hand, you’re going to get a good response.
ID: 10181610 15. You’d be comfortable sleeping with Panda. View this image ›
Anabgd / Getty Images Being able to comfortably share a bed and get good sleep together is important for couples. Well, what food makes you sleepier after eating it than Panda Express? Imagine going steady with Panda and having those high quality snooze sessions for a lifetime — that’s a happily ever after.
ID: 10182990
